page.title: 13Newborough Community Centre
page.content:
The{Youth and Community Centre}is the focal point for many of{Newborough's} activities.
It is a wooden hut built around 1975 and comprising a Hall, kitchen, cloakroom and toilets with storage under the building. It is owned by the {Staffordshire County Council}and maintained by them with the help of a caretaker.
The{Y&CC}Committee consists of representatives from{Staffs.Education {Committee, local councils}and those of the{general public}who are interested in youth activities or who use the Centre.
Evening Classes include{flower {arranging, cake decorating}and{art.}
